= Deploying the Kroxylicious operator from manifests



.Prerequisites

* xref:have_a_kubectl-operator[Access to the Kubernetes cluster using `kubectl`.]

.Procedure

. Apply the installation manifests
+
[source,shell]
----
kubectl apply -f install
----
